meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6546.

td.p: Dan McShane, a bartender from West Islip, New York
Kristin Morgan, a strategic analyst for NASA from Huntsville, Alabama
Keith Whitener, a research chemist originally from Charlotte, North Carolina

tr.td: NATIONALITIES?
LITERARY TERMS
BING'S TOP SEARCHES: 2012
AN "IMP"ISH CATEGORY
MICRO
MANAGE
